dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4547 IH: To modify the definition of “antique firearm”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To modify the definition of antique firearm.

section.header: Amendment to title 18, United States Code
section.text: Section 921(a)(16)(A) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking 1898 and inserting 1913.

section.header: Amendment to Internal Revenue Code of 1986
section.text: Subsection (g) of section 5845 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking 1898 each place it appears and inserting 1913.
